online.game
Class RcBoard

java.lang.Object
  online.game.RcBoard

public class RcBoard
extends java.lang.Object

a board-like class where the cells have random coordinates instead of being in a grid. The picture for the board should be displayed using G.centerImage(java.awt.Graphics, java.awt.Image, int, int, int, int, java.awt.image.ImageObserver) in a rectangle, and the same rectangle should be passed to setDisplayRectangle

Author:
ddyer

Constructor Summary
RcBoard()
          this is the default constructor where the user supplied coordinates are 0.0-1.0 to indicate a percentage of the whole board size
RcBoard(double w, double h)
          this constructor create a board where the user supplied coordinatges are 0.0-nnn, or effectively can be pixel points in a real image.
